basics.name: Rutvik Joshi
basics.label: Research Assistant/ AI Engineer
basics.interests: Drone Surveying & Inspection, Industrial Safety Monitoring, Robotic Systems, Spatiotemporal Machine Learning, Human Behavior Modeling, Deep Reinforcement Learning

work.name: FOSSEE, Indian Institute of Technology-Bombay
summary: Developed Osdag’s Compression and Flexural member design modules using Python, usability testing to identify and address GUI issues, optimizing the overall user experience.
Devised innovative methods to enhance the functionality of existing features and provide greater user control. Used Git version control system and Anaconda package manager.
Executed a functional prototype for Osdag on cloud, used React in front-end development and PostgreSQL as database management system.
Trained students in software development and use of open-source tools through G20 event, Spoken-Tutorial Workshops and Activities.

work.name: Burns & McDonnell India
work.summary: Develop Excel sheets using VBA. Carried out the project scheduling and looked after the resources and labor allocation. Worked on design of Anchor bolts, Retaining walls, Pipe rack structures, Foundation design for Electric vehicle infrastructures, Prefabricated Structures, Oil & Gas.
